page.title: 07A Day in the Life of:-
page.content: {A twelve year old boy} ** {Friday} I am awakened by my alarm at 7.00 a.m. I go down for breakfast, which is usually a bowl of cereal and a drink.I set off for the bus stop at 8.05 a.m. The bus arrives some 20 minutes later getting to school at 8.40 a.m. School starts at 8.45 a.m. and the first thing we have is assembly at 9.00 a.m. Assemblies are given either by a particular class teacher or the Headmaster. After assembly we have maths until break. During this time we also have time for a spelling test in which we try to beat each other for top marks. After break we have English activities, grammar, comprehension or reading. After dinner, which is usually chips, we play football on the field until 1.15 p.m.The teams are picked by two captains, or just at random to try to make them as fair as possible......
